attributes.action: Stop professional football matches during lockdown.
attributes.additional_details: Everyone needs to be united in the fight against COVID so why should high earning football players be allowed to have close contact, especially as they are not following the guidelines the general public are expected to.
attributes.background: Stop allowing footballers to earn large amounts of money playing football whilst ignoring lockdown rules.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/566813
